mapper.select: SELECT W.*, CASE WSTATE WHEN 'WAIT' THEN '대기' WHEN 'ING' THEN '진행' WHEN 'DONE' THEN '완료' WHEN 'REJECT' THEN '반려' WHEN 'DELEGATE' THEN '대리' END AS STATUSNAME FROM WORK W WHERE WCODE = #{wcode}
mapper.update: UPDATE WORK SET WSTATE = 'ING' WHERE WCODE = #{wcode}
mapper.select: SELECT W.*, E1.NAME AS requesterName, E2.NAME AS managerName FROM WORK W JOIN EMPLOYEE E1 ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = E1.ENO JOIN EMPLOYEE E2 ON W.MANAGER_ENO = E2.ENO WHERE W.MANAGER_ENO = #{eno}
SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.WSTATUS, W.ENO, E.NAME AS employeeName FROM WORK W JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON W.ENO = E.ENO WHERE W.ENO = #{eno}
mapper.update: UPDATE WORK SET WTITLE = #{wtitle}, WEND = #{wend}, WSTATE = #{wstate}, WCONTENT = #{wcontent} WHERE WCODE = #{wcode}
